sentences.cn: 是不是大多数的公路意外都是可以避免的?

sentences.en: Children are still dying in their millions from preventable diseases.
sentences.cn: 仍有数以百万计的儿童死于可预防的疾病.

sentences.en: Forty thousand children a day die from preventable diseases.
sentences.cn: 每天有四万儿童死于本可以防止的疾病。

sentences.en: Forty-thousand children a day die from preventable diseases.
sentences.cn: 每天有4万个孩子死于本可以预防的疾病。

sentences.en: Many of these conditions are easily preventable.
sentences.cn: 而多数情况都是易于避免的.

sentences.en: Most common health upsets that spoil a holiday are easily preventable.
sentences.cn: 导致假期泡汤的大多数常见的身体不适都是很容易预防的。

sentences.en: PEOPLE WITH SERIOUS, PREVENTABLE HEAD INJURIES LOOK STUPID!
sentences.cn: 有安全意识的人是可以阻止自己的头部受到伤害的难看样子.

sentences.en: Result: There were 64 identified ADE, among which 28 % were preventable.
sentences.cn: 结果: 5个月研究期间共鉴定ADE64次, 其中28%可以防范.

sentences.en: The great bulk of chronic diseases are preventable.
sentences.cn: 大部分慢性疾病是可以预防的.

sentences.en: The leading cause of preventable hearing loss is excessive noise.
sentences.cn: 导致可预防听力损失的首要原因是过度的噪音.

sentences.en: The number one cause of preventable deaths is tobacco.
sentences.cn: 排名首位的可预防性死因是烟草.

sentences.en: The W . H. O. says studies suggest that about half of these problems preventable.
sentences.cn: 世界卫生组织表示,研究表示这些问题中约一半是可以避免的.

sentences.en: The World Health Organization says preventable injuries and deaths from surgical care are a growing concern.
sentences.cn: 世界卫生组织表示,这些本可避免的外科手术伤亡人数越来越引起人们关注.
这些伤害完全可以预防.

sentences.en: This statistic is made more tragic by the fact that almost always preventable.
sentences.cn: 而如许之多的悲剧,很多是可以避免的.

sentences.en: Type A H 1 N 1 influenza is preventable, controllable and curable.
sentences.cn: 甲型H1N1流感可防 、 可控、可治.

words.tran_cn: 预期的；以前的；预防的；先行的
可预防的；可阻止的；可防止的

trans.tran_en: Preventable diseases, illnesses, or deaths could be stopped from occurring
